snippet.title: Paperama - iOS / Android - HD Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Paperama by FDG Entertainment (iOS / Android)

Enter a beautiful Origami world and bring it to life!

**Introducing a new and unique puzzle adventure**

- Fold the paper sheets to create origami figures
- work as accurate as possible to fit the form
- Don't use too many folds!

- Enjoy how a wonderful origami world comes to life

Features:

- Amazing 3D folding effect
- Lovely Soundtrack
- More than 70 puzzles
- Smart Hint System
- Game Center Support

iTunes Store Page:

https://itunes.apple.com/nz/app/paperama/id842608717?mt=8

Google Play:

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.fdgentertainment.paperama

Twitter:

https://twitter.com/FDG_Games

Facebook:

https://www.facebook.com/FDGEntertainment
